General.Name: Il Sung Const
General.Description: Ilsung Construction Co., Ltd. operates as a construction company in South Korea, Philippines, Myanmar, Cambodia, Laos, Paraguay, and internationally. It undertakes housing, gardening, plant, and infrastructure works under the True-L brand. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Ilsung Construction Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Ib Capital Ltd.
